metadata.title: EA Transport - International Freight Transport
metadata.description: International freight transport from Albania to Europe. Safe and fast transport services.
metadata.services_description: Professional freight transport services: international shipping, express delivery, logistics solutions and customs services. Request a free quote!
metadata.about_description: EA Transport - international transport company with 15+ years of experience. Connecting Albania to Europe with reliable freight services.
metadata.contact_description: Contact us for international freight transport. Request a free quote online or call us. Coverage in 30+ European countries.

hero.title: International Freight Transport
hero.subtitle: Connecting Albania to Europe
hero.description: Professional transport solutions for your business. Safe and timely deliveries across Europe.

services.title: Comprehensive Logistics Solutions
services.subtitle: From freight forwarding to express delivery, we provide end-to-end logistics solutions tailored to your business needs.

freight.title: Freight Transport
freight.description: Safe transport of goods from Albania throughout Europe.

frigo.title: Refrigerated Transport
frigo.description: Specialized temperature-controlled transport for goods requiring cold chain preservation.

express.title: Express Van Transport
express.description: Fast van service for urgent shipments and smaller loads.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Our Story
about.description: EA Transport is an international transport company based in Albania. With years of experience in the industry, we provide reliable and professional transport services.
about.story_p1: EA Transport was founded with a simple mission: to provide reliable, efficient, and professional transport services connecting Albania with Europe.
about.story_p2: Over the years, we have grown from a small local operation to a trusted partner for businesses across the continent. Our success is built on a foundation of punctuality, safety, and customer satisfaction.
about.story_p3: Today, we operate a modern fleet of vehicles and employ a team of experienced professionals dedicated to ensuring your goods reach their destination safely and on time.

safety.title: Safety
safety.description: Your goods are safe with us.

partners.title: Trusted by Industry Leaders
partners.subtitle: Working with the best companies in Europe

q1.question: Which countries do you cover?
q1.answer: We cover all European Union countries, as well as the Western Balkans and Turkey.

q2.question: How long does transport take?
q2.answer: Transport time depends on the destination. For Italy, usually 1-2 days, for Germany 3-4 days.

q3.question: Do you offer cargo insurance?
q3.answer: Yes, all our shipments are insured. Basic insurance is included in the price.

q4.question: How can I track my shipment?
q4.answer: You will receive a tracking number that you can use on our website.

review1.text: EA Transport has been our reliable partner for over 3 years. Their punctuality and professionalism are unmatched in the region.
review1.name: Marco Rossi

review2.text: We ship weekly from Tirana to Germany and have never had a single issue. Excellent communication throughout the entire process.
review2.name: Arben Hoxha

review3.text: Fast customs clearance and competitive pricing. They handle everything so we can focus on growing our business.
review3.name: Elena Berisha
